title: Lets get rid of all the annoying champions

"People disagreed?  Everyone that did is a *stupid nerd!* HEHE XD!"
Or we could just get rid of you instead and there would be one less trash player crying.
Welp since all these little nerds get so worked up over my comments, I see no reason to stop
Of course, thats what theses stupid nerds do
You don't seem to understand that every champion in this game and this game is annoying, therefore there would be no game.

That is not true. Take {{champion:12}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:106}}  for example. They have kits that lack a lot, but what they do they do well. They aren't overloaded or annoying to play against, but they are not weak wither. Well, Alistair was weakish hopefully the buffs will fix that.  There are many champions that are not annoying, yet not weak and have definite weaknesses to exploit. And in the right role they are strong.  There easily could be game that didnt annoy the shit out of people, but you lack creative imagination and are just a Riot drone. So who even cares what you think.

See the problem here is that you think "annoying to play against" is a fact when it's more of an opinion. 

I personally find all four of those annoying to play against to some extent. Vel'koz's ult combo is frustrating, Volibear's bite is dumb on top of him being a ball of stats, Brand makes my time in bot annoying, and Alistar's WQ combo can't really be countered from my experience.

Oh boy here we go. Its not an opinion that isnt shared by a lot of people Overall the champions I first listed are banned WAY more than any of the 4 non annoying champions I listed. 

You even said "to some extent". You are basically saying that they arent nearly as annoying as the other ones! WHY are you trying to fight me on this. The ones I listed are super annoying and its a pretty common opinion among players. Sure Voli bite is annoying but its his only real damage in his kit!

Because arguing that a champion needs to be removed because they're annoying is a really poor argument in the first place.

Sigh. Dude, I am not complaining for myself. Its what they do to my team when I'm still in lane. Its how our mid or jungle feeds them. I am not concerned for me. I will win lane against any one of them, but later on in team fights, when I don't have control always, they are very hard for players to deal with and its costs me regularly
We are only as strong as our weakest link.

And yet, people often enjoy playing them too. I don't think anyone has picked up Fizz, played him, and went "OMG this person is annoying the crap out of me"(unless it was in reference to his voice, then maybe)

And Yasuo, one of the most hated champs, is also one of the most loved, with the difference between the amount of games played on him vs most other champs being massive.

And yet, strangely, I do not feel the anger others do about these champs. I accept that they are part of the game, and work towards finding ways to keep them down. You should try it, its relaxing, knowing you have a strategy that will crush the life out of them.
Fizz either needs a re - work or a nerf. Completely unbalanced champion that makes you miss 90% of the time. Where's the fun in that?!
Let's get rid of Aatrox so his mains shut up.
yeah yeah, how funny. You bore me.
Good thing I'm not trying to entertain at the moment.
Except Eve doesn't have insane mobility, untargetability or invisibility.

She has camo, and when she's invisible and not near you you can't target her.

Can hurt her with effects, though.
Its not fun but stupid nerds dont understand that which is why my post is dowvoted

I was... backing up your point...

And I have no problem with Eve. She's kinda weak, and using AoE stuff will light her up.

130 some champions, feels like 30. I am not going let Riot decide for me who I have to play in order to climb faster or have a higher win rate. If you want to roll over for them thats fine. But when new players first play the game, and get attached to a champion, at that point they don't know whats good and whats not. Im not going to stop playing Aatrox just because Riot likes to pick winners and losers. 10 bans will really help though.
